sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function Topdeals(props) { const{TopDeals} = props; return (
{TopDeals.map((item)=>(
-{item.discount}%

{item.title}

{'★'.repeat(5)} {item.review} reviews
{item.price.toFixed(2)}
  • {item.screen}
  • {item.os}
  • {item.inches}
Sold : {item.sold}/100 Products
))}
) }
